translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「クケケケケケ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Kukekekekeke!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスの敗退、これに最もダメージを受けたのは、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The one who took the most damage from Rance's defeat was,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 当然正面山道を守っていた部隊である。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: of course, the unit guarding the main mountain path.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔人を殺せる筈の部隊の敗退は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The defeat of the unit that was supposed to be able to kill the demon,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早雲率いる部隊の士気を極限まで下げた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: greatly lowered the morale of the unit led by Soun.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「も、もうここは駄目です、早雲殿！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I-it's hopeless here already, Lord Soun!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうか、撤退、せめて後退のご指示を！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Please, order a retreat, at least a fallback!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「このままでは兵が無駄に死ぬだけです！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "At this rate, soldiers will just die in vain!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早雲は考える。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Soun thought.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今、最も合理的で、最も効率的な方法を。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The most rational and efficient method now.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そして結論を出し、顔を歪めた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then he reached a conclusion and grimaced.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 早雲は懐からバサリと大量の札を取り出した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Soun pulled out a large stack of tags from his pocket with a swish.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「早雲様！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Lord Soun!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「――徹底抗戦だ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "—Fight to the last man."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ただの一体も通らせるな！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't let a single one through!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 断固死守せよ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hold your ground to the death!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そ、そんな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "N-no way..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「逃げろとはまだ命じられていない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "We have not yet been ordered to retreat.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その命令が来るまで、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Until that order comes,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺達に出来ることは戦うことだけだ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: the only thing we can do is to fight."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ここで退いてはそれこそ人類は負ける！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If we retreat here, humanity will surely lose!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最後まで諦めるんじゃない！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Don't give up until the very end!"
"Y-yes..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ははあっ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Y-yes, sir!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 武器を取り、正面山道の兵は未だ諦めない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The soldiers on the main mountain path took up their weapons and still did not give up.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、魔人レッドアイを筆頭とした部隊は
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, the unit led by the demon Red Eye

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: より侵攻の勢いを強め、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: strengthened their assault momentum,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今や正面山道は総崩れをする寸前であった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and now the main mountain path was on the verge of a total collapse.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ほほぉー……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hohooo...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: やっとる、やっとる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They're really trying, really trying."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その戦場に、今までランス城にいた
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In that battlefield, Copandon, who had been at Rance's castle until now,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドンが悠々と現れた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: appeared calmly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その背にはいつもと違う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: On his back was something different than usual,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: お神籤箱-ﾐｸｼﾞﾊﾞｺ-を抱えていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he was holding an omikuji box [fortune box].

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うしゃ、ほな行こか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Alright, then let's go."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ま、待って下さいコパンドン様！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "W-wait, Lord Copandon!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ん、なんやユーティン、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hmm? What's up, Yuutin,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 来んでええ言うたやろ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I told you there's no need to come."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それ……どうするつもりなんですか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What... what do you intend to do with that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「使う」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Use it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「駄目、駄目です！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, you can't!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その究極お神籤だけは使っちゃ駄目です！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You must not use that ultimate fortune box!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「確かにそれは強力な武器で……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's certainly a powerful weapon...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドン様にしか使えませんが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and only Lord Copandon can use it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その分、とっても危険です！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but because of that, it's very dangerous!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大吉を引けばどんな敵でも撃退できますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you draw a great blessing, you can repel any enemy,

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

output_text: translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "What... what do you intend to do with that?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「使う」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Use it."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「駄目、駄目です！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No, you can't!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「その究極お神籤だけは使っちゃ駄目です！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "You must not use that ultimate fortune box!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「確かにそれは強力な武器で……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "It's certainly a powerful weapon...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: コパンドン様にしか使えませんが……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and only Lord Copandon can use it...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その分、とっても危険です！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but because of that, it's very dangerous!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「大吉を引けばどんな敵でも撃退できますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you draw a great blessing, you can repel any enemy,
